text:
Newly open on the 13 Sep 2024.
Pork station closed at 2pm.
The place is surprising not so large as I have expected.
Newly opened on 13th September. It's located on the 1st floor. Carpark is 2nd floor. The store is not too big but still quite sufficient.

No network at all at the ntuc. Counter is always closed in the morning/noon. Hardly have any staff there too to ask for help if need help at the self service kiosk. Maybe need hire more staff there. Elderly doesn’t know how to do self checkout. My mum went there and had some problem with the self checkout, manage to get one staff for help. Feedback to them that the counter always not open. Self service also most of the time no staff there then she have a discount voucher which can’t use. The staff reply her attitude and give her a face.

The cashier counter perpectually  closed ( dont know y). I tried to buy a trolly of things from this supermarket. No place to put all things on check out counter. Check out machine space all very small, if buy alot of things not very comfortable to check out. unlike Sing siong their check out counter spaces are much larger and thus comfortable to buy more things.

For a decent sized supermarket, it has very limited items. Went down twice to get items (lemon, cake flour, thicken cream) but did not have. Had to go nearby sheng shiong (about the same size with so much more items)
